DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine objective response rate , time progression , survival patient previously untreated advanced hepatobiliary cancer treat dolastatin 10 . II . Determine toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This open label , multicenter study . Patients receive dolastatin 10 IV bolus every 3 week . Treatment continue minimum 2 course absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 14-35 evaluable patient accrue study within 9 month .
